content.rendered:
The Arturo Tub chair with its elegant design brings a modern look to your venue, whether it be a hotel, bar or other commercial environment. 

It provides true comfort with it’s padded arms and seat, and being available as a sofa you can completely fit out your venue with these stylish chairs if you wish to.

This is a high quality, commercial grade chair, which comes in selections of faux leather.

Comes with 6 Float Buttons as standard, however option to have without is available. 

Shown in a custom fabric.

2 year warranty.

This item may require some basic self-assembly.
